[Home](./index.md) &gt; [opensearch-dashboards](./opensearch-dashboards.md) &gt; [ICspConfig](./opensearch-dashboards.icspconfig.md)

## ICspConfig interface

CSP configuration for use in OpenSearch Dashboards.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ICspConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [header](./opensearch-dashboards.icspconfig.header.md) | string | The CSP rules in a formatted directives string for use in a <code>Content-Security-Policy</code> header. |
|  [rules](./opensearch-dashboards.icspconfig.rules.md) | string\[\] | The CSP rules used for OpenSearch Dashboards. |
|  [strict](./opensearch-dashboards.icspconfig.strict.md) | boolean | Specify whether browsers that do not support CSP should be able to use OpenSearch Dashboards. Use <code>true</code> to block and <code>false</code> to allow. |
|  [warnLegacyBrowsers](./opensearch-dashboards.icspconfig.warnlegacybrowsers.md) | boolean | Specify whether users with legacy browsers should be warned about their lack of OpenSearch Dashboards security compliance. |
